recalcitrant: Not obedient, resisting authority, hard to manage
rarefied: Lofty, very high up or elevated (in a metaphorical way); exclusive, select; thin, pure, or less dense (as air at the top of a mountain)
reactant: Something that reacts; a substance that undergoes a change in a chemical reaction
quixotic: Extremely impractical but very romantic, chivalrous, or idealistic; impulsive
pungent: Having a sharp taste or smell; biting, stimulating, sharp
